mapper.select: select * from `km_member_point` where `uid`=#{uid} order by `pointDate` desc limit 5;
SELECT a.*, b.prodName from `km_product_review` AS a JOIN `km_product` AS b ON a.prodNo=b.prodNo where `uid`=#{uid} order by `rdate` desc limit 5;

SELECT a.*, b.*, c.prodName, c.company, c.thumb1 FROM `km_product_order_item` AS a JOIN `km_product_order` AS b ON a.ordNo=b.ordNo JOIN `km_product` AS c ON a.prodNo=c.prodNo WHERE b.uid=#{uid} ORDER BY b.`ordDate` DESC LIMIT 5;
